recipesJson.name: Banana Coffee Milkshake
recipesJson.author: BebopGear
recipesJson.description:
HEY! Guys I Need Your Help!
Please mix this recipe and give me some feedback! If you can.

I know this is a unconventional profile but it is pretty good. Give it a try and let me know what you think.

You can shake and vape but it's a little bit strong but not overwhelming. It mellow out after three days.

Its amazing for your first vape in the morning.

Thanks guys, Keep mixing.
